comment: "This 'Caravan' is a UN-funded invasion of the United States. There are hundreds of thousands of illegal migrants who live in temporary camps that are preparing to follow this route to America. They are planning on flooding millions of more illegal migrants into America. This is an invasion of the United States." ~ Alex Jones
amr:
# ::snt "This 'Caravan' is a UN-funded invasion of the United States. There are hundreds of thousands of illegal migrants who live in temporary camps that are preparing to follow this route to America. They are planning on flooding millions of more illegal migrants into America. This is an invasion of the United States." ~ Alex Jones
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / invade-01
            :ARG0 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "United"
                        :op2 "States"))
            :ARG1-of (f / fund-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "UN")))
            :domain (c2 / caravan
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :snt2 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (m2 / migrate-01)
            :ARG1-of (l / legal-02
                  :polarity -)
            :quant (m3 / multiple
                  :op1 100000)
            :ARG0-of (l2 / live-01
                  :location (c3 / camp
                        :mod (t2 / temporary)))
            :ARG0-of (p2 / prepare-02
                  :ARG1 (f2 / follow-01
                        :ARG1 (r / route
                              :mod (t3 / this))
                        :ARG2 (c4 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "America")))))
      :snt3 (p3 / plan-01
            :ARG0 (t4 / they)
            :ARG1 (f3 / flood-01
                  :ARG0 t4
                  :ARG1 c4
                  :ARG2 (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (m4 / migrate-01)
                        :ARG1-of (l3 / legal-02
                              :polarity -)
                        :quant (m5 / multiple
                              :op1 1000000)
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                              :ARG3 (m6 / more)))))
      :snt4 (ii2 / invade-01
            :ARG0 (t5 / this)
            :ARG1 c4)
      :snt5 (ii3 / invade-01
            :ARG0 (t6 / this))
      :source (p5 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Alex"
                  :op2 "Jones")))

comment: The language used in the posts is both racist and offensive to black people and homosexuals. Do not use 'nigger and faggots'
amr:
# ::snt The language used in the posts is both racist and offensive to black people and homosexuals. Do not use 'nigger and faggots'
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (r / racist
                  :domain (l / language
                        :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                              :ARG2 (p / post-01))))
            :op2 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 l
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG1-of (b / black-05))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :mod (h / homosexual)))))
      :snt2 (u2 / use-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (n / nigger)
                  :op2 (f / faggot))))

comment: Think twice about what you say as the words are undignified.
amr:
# ::snt Think twice about what you say as the words are undignified.
(t / think-01
      :frequency 2
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (t2 / thing
            :ARG1-of (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 y))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (d / dignify-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (w / word))))

(u / use-01
